translation: If he suddenly peers into the [gate@俞] teaching of the Śākyas and goes on for more than ten years, then not only is he clumsy in regard to the Dharma, but he also has a mind that seeks to undermine it. For this reason, he must create a treatise on observing the mind. He's rich and has no path, and he often grows proud.
